element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT smgetdocprop ('CO', t.docco, 'CustomLabels.Менеджер', '') manager, (SELECT name FROM smclientinfo i WHERE i.id = t.clientindex) clientname, t.docco, DECODE (t.contracttype, 0, 'основной', 1, 'дополнительный', 2, 'маркетинговый') type, t.id doccq, utils.transferdays (t.deliverydays) AS deliverydays, t.orderfreq, DECODE (smgetdocprop ('CO', t.docco, 'CustomLabels.RC', '0'), 1, 'РЦ', 'ТО') rc, smgetdocprop ('CO', t.docco, 'CustomLabels.наименование товара', '') good FROM (SELECT d.id, d.doctype, d.clientindex, d.commentary, c.contracttype, c.deliverydays, c.orderfreq, (SELECT b.baseid FROM smcommonbases b WHERE b.basedoctype = 'CO' AND b.doctype = d.doctype AND b.id = d.id AND ROWNUM = 1) docco FROM smdocuments d, smdoccq c WHERE d.doctype = 'CQ' AND d.docstate = 2 AND c.id = d.id AND c.doctype = d.doctype AND (c.endsat >= TRUNC (SYSDATE) OR c.endsat IS NULL) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM smcommonbases b, smdocprops dp WHERE b.basedoctype = 'CO' AND b.doctype = d.doctype AND b.id = d.id AND dp.docid = b.baseid AND dp.doctype = b.basedoctype AND dp.paramname = 'CustomLabels.автозаказ' AND dp.paramvalue = '1')) t ORDER BY 1, 2, 3

element.name: rpcol
element.sql: SELECT NVL (l.shortname, l.name) name FROM smcontractlocations cl, smstorelocations l WHERE cl.doctype = 'CQ' AND cl.id = :rpbody.doccq AND cl.locationid = l.id
